body_content.explanation: a condition in which part of the body is a different shape from normal:
examples: The disorder is characterized by distinctive facial dysmorphia and cardiac defects.

body_content.explanation: Some people use dysmorphia to refer to a condition in which someone falsely believes there is something wrong with the size or shape of their body:
examples: I've got a touch of dysmorphia. When I look in the mirror I see someone more overweight than I actually am.
